lines.gurmukhi: jYsy kuAwr kMinAw imil Kylq Anyk sKI skl ko eykY idn hoq n ibvwh jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Kuaar Kanniaa Mili Khaylat Anayk Sakhee , Sakal Ko Aykai Din Hot N Bivaah Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as many virgin maids assemble and play with each other but all of them are not married off on the same day.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bIr Kyq ibKY jwq hY suBt jyqy sbY n mrq qyqy ssqRn snwh jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Beer Khayt Bikhai Jaat Hai Soubhat Jaytay , Sabai N Marat Taytay Sasatran Sanaah Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as many warriors go to the battlefield fully armed and protected with armour coat do not die in the battlefield.

lines.gurmukhi: bwvn smIp jYsy ibibiD bnwspqI eykY byr cMdn krq hY n qwih jI
lines.transliteration_english: Baavan Sameep Jaisay Bibidhi Banaasapatee , Aykai Bayr Chandan Karat Hai N Taahi Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as there are many trees and plants around a grove of sandalwood trees, but all are not blessed with the fragrance of Sandalwood at once.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur crn srin jwqu hY jgq jIvn mukiq pd cwihq hY jwih jI ]417]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gur Charan Sarani Jaatu Hai Jagata , Jeevan Moukati Pad Chaahit Hai Jaahi Jee ?417?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the whole world may go to the refuge of the True Guru but he alone attains the status of living emancipated who 'is liked by Him. (That particular disciple who serves Guru with faith and devotion).  (417)
